<<<api>>>: Activity.findViewById
<<<code>>>: public class SearchView {
    private MenuActivity menuActivity;
    public SearchView(MenuActivity menuActivity) {
        this.menuActivity = menuActivity;
        ImageView searchButton = (ImageView) menuActivity.findViewById(R.id.searchButton);
    }
}
// In your MenuActivity
SearchView searchView = new SearchView(this);
<<<explanation>>>: You should not instantiate an Activity class directly. Instead, you should pass the instance of the Activity to the class where you want to use it. In this case, you can pass the instance of MenuActivity to the constructor of SearchView. Then, you can use findViewById method of the passed Activity instance to find the view.
